metadata.dc:title: Raices historicas del concepto de centro de origen en la biogeografia dispersionista: del Eden biblico al modelo de Darwin-Wallace.
[The historical roots of the concept of center of origin in dispersalist biogeography: from the biblical Eden to the Darwin-Wallace model].
